name: Desert Buggy Dirt Rally Challenge - Free 4 wheel Monster Racing
name_original: Desert Buggy Dirt Rally Challenge - Free 4 wheel Monster Racing
description:
Go ahead and live out your Desert Buggy Dirt Rally Challenge
3D racing dreams with Buggy.

Ride your Desert Buggy on unusually challenging obstacle courses and try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline action-packed , heart-thumping Desert Buggy Dirt Rally Challenge 3D racing game.

Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the Dest Buggy and rider.

-Unique and smooth gameplay

- Addictive , exciting and hard levels

-Accelerometer support

-Earn stars for your best local times.

Lets Play Desert Buggy Dirt Rally Challenge
3D racing Game And Break The Top Score.
